articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Saudi Aramco shares hit lowest since IPO, down 1.7%
articles.description: Shares of Saudi Aramco were down 1.7% in late afternoon trade on Sunday, hitting 34.55 riyals ($9.21) per share, its lowest level since it started trading last month after a record initial public offering (IPO).
articles.content:
DUBAI (Reuters) - Shares of Saudi Aramco were down 1.7% in late afternoon trade on Sunday, hitting 34.55 riyals ($9.21) per share, its lowest level since it started trading last month after a record initial public offering (IPO). 
The shares reacted to acros… [+355 chars]

articles.author: Ahmed Rasheed
articles.title: UPDATE 1-Iraq parliament to convene amid calls to expel U.S. troops
articles.description: Iraqi lawmakers said they would use a special parliamentary session on Sunday to push for a vote on a resolution requiring the government to ask Washington to withdraw U.S. troops from the country.'
articles.content:
(Adds Nassiriya, Basra protests) 
By Ahmed Rasheed 
BAGHDAD, Jan 5 (Reuters) - Iraqi lawmakers said they would use a special parliamentary session on Sunday to push for a vote on a resolution requiring the government to ask Washington to withdraw U.S. troop… [+3000 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: At least 30 killed in Libya military academy attack
articles.description: At least 30 people were killed and 33 others wounded in an attack on a military academy in the Libyan capital late on Saturday, the health ministry of the Tripoli-based government said in a statement on Sunday.
articles.content:
Tripoli (Reuters) - At least 30 people were killed and 33 others wounded in an attack on a military academy in the Libyan capital late on Saturday, the health ministry of the Tripoli-based government said in a statement on Sunday. 
Tripoli, controlled by the… [+3538 chars]

articles.description: The Golden Globes for film and television, organized by the Hollywood Foreign Press Association, will be presented on Sunday at a gala dinner hosted by British comedian Ricky Gervais in Beverly Hills, California.

articles.title: Iran condemns Trump as 'terrorist in a suit' after attack threat
articles.description: Iran condemned Donald Trump on Sunday as a "terrorist in a suit" after the U.S. president threatened to hit 52 Iranian sites hard if Tehran attacks Americans or U.S. assets in retaliation for the killing of military commander Qassem Soleimani.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: No Kyrgios? No problem for hosts Australia in ATP Cup
articles.description: Nick Kyrgios' late withdrawal due to a back problem did not stop Australia from defeating Canada in their ATP Cup tie on Sunday as the hosts strengthened their bid for a quarter-final spot with their second 3-0 win in the inaugural team event.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Six German tourists killed by suspected drunk driver in Italy
articles.description: Six German tourists were killed on Sunday after a suspected drunk driver crashed into a group of people in a town in northern Italy, police said.
articles.content:
MILAN (Reuters) - Six German tourists were killed on Sunday after a suspected drunk driver crashed into a group of people in a town in northern Italy, police said. 
Eleven other people were injured, some seriously, in the incident which happened in the early… [+466 chars]
